contents.text: Welcome to Docker, the San Francisco-based container platform driving every application across the hybrid cloud.
For sales and licensing inquiries, press 1.
For new enterprise sales opportunities, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our enterprise sales team.

navigationGoals: I need details and pricing for an enterprise licensing package for our container platform
I want to discuss enterprise licensing options for Docker to deploy my veteran outreach platform.
I want to discuss enterprise licensing options for Docker Enterprise with Kubernetes support.
I need help understanding pricing and options for an enterprise Docker license.
I need pricing info for enterprise Docker licenses for our university research group

contents.text: For existing accounts and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our account management and billing department.

navigationGoals: I need to resolve a billing discrepancy on my existing Docker subscription invoice
I need to clarify a billing issue on my existing Docker account for the nonprofit I run.
I need to clarify unexpected billing charges on my existing Docker account invoice.
I’d like to clarify the charges on my existing Docker subscription invoice.
I need to clarify a charge on my existing Docker subscription

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
For installation and setup assistance, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a Docker support specialist for installation and setup assistance.

navigationGoals: I need step-by-step help installing and configuring Docker on my development environment
I need assistance setting up Docker on my community project’s server.
I need assistance configuring Docker Engine and Compose on my new Ubuntu server cluster.
I need step-by-step assistance installing Docker on my computer.
I need help installing Docker on my Linux lab workstation

contents.text: For container performance and orchestration issues, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our advanced support team for container performance and orchestration troubleshooting.

navigationGoals: I need assistance troubleshooting performance and orchestration issues in my Docker containers
I need help troubleshooting performance bottlenecks in my Docker orchestration.
I need help troubleshooting container orchestration performance issues in my Docker environment.
My Docker containers are running very slowly; I need help improving their performance.
I need assistance tuning container orchestration for my parallel computing experiments
